DataElement.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Product Dose PCORnet CDM Prescription Ordered Dose Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A material with particular features.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Units of measure associated with the dose of the medication as ordered by the provider.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A material with particular features.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet CDM Prescription Ordered Dose Unit of Measure
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Units of measure associated with the dose of the medication as ordered by the provider.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified used as a standard measurement of same kinds, such as pound or kilogram in measuring weight. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ValueDomain.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model

DataElement.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and PCORNet value set for CDM.
